ml.alternet.misc

Class JAXBStream<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.misc.JAXBStream<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the items.

    public class JAXBStream<T>
extends Object
    Stream repeatable elements from an XML document to objects with JAXB. Typical XML document is : 
    <list xmlns="http://example.com/foo">
    <item>...</item>
    <item>...</item>
    <item>...</item>
    ...
</list>

    Usage

    For unmarshalling each <item> to com.example.foo.Item, use :

    QName <- {http://example.com/foo}item

    class <- com.example.foo.Item

    URL <- http://example.com/api/foo/list.xml

    This class embeds a cache strategy but doesn't define a retention strategy ; however the cache can be clear at will.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JAXBStream.CacheStrategy
      Indicates the caching strategy when the stream is read several times.

        Parameters:

        elem - The name of the element to fetch.
        clazz - The class of the object to fetch.
        cacheStrategy - The cache strategy for reading again.
